nTests.comment: The number of tests to be performed for each dimension

nClients.comment: numbers of clients to be benchmarked

competitors.comment: A list of configurations to run against each other in this benchmark

resultFile.comment: The name of a file to which results of the

intermediateResultFile.comment: The name of a file where the results of the runs of the subprocesses are written to.
This should be identical with the result file name configured in the subprogram directory

mpirunLocation.comment: The location of the mpirun executable to use

nMaxThreads.comment: Limit for threads when using automatic setting of number of threads with respect to number of consumers.

interMeasurementDelaySecs.comment: Delay in between starting benchmark executables, which might be helpful to give the OS time to free up resources
